version.description: The default x.y-pre version to use as the basis for version calculations.

assemblyVersion.description: The x.y version to use particularly for the AssemblyVersionAttribute instead of the default. This is useful when maintaining assembly binding compatibility on the desktop .NET Framework is important even though AssemblyFileVersion may change.

buildNumberOffset.description: A number to add to the git height when calculating the build number.

publicReleaseRefSpec.description: An array of regular expressions that may match a ref (branch or tag) that should be built with PublicRelease=true as the default value. The ref matched against is in its canonical form (e.g. refs/heads/master)
